Different Crime.Crime Name: Breach of natural justice in immigration proceedings
procedural_fairness: continuous, precise, competent, impartial, and contemporaneous interpretation
judicial_review_process: review of IAD's refusal to reopen case based on alleged interpretation issues
administrative_error: alleged interpretation errors deemed trivial by IAD
reasonableness_of_decision: court agreed with IAD's finding of no material impact on fairness
decision_outcome: no breach of natural justice; judicial review dismissed
burden_of_proof: no requirement to show actual prejudice for breach

procedural_fairness: continuous, precise, competent, impartial, and contemporaneous interpretation
appeal_process: IAD's refusal to reopen the appeal
